Title: The Block is Hot
Plot: Its February, and its record temperatures of 90 degrees. Luckily, Jazmine has her lemonade stand open, and does pretty well. Her success catches the eye of corporate tycoon Ed Wuncler. Despite several warnings from Huey, Jazmine then learns the true meaning of "capitalism" when Wuncler decides to buy the stand.
GuestStars: Ed Asner, Dee Bradley Baker, Jim Cummings, Chad Einbinder, Tress MacNeille, James Arnold Taylor
